thread.title: Sundial Grower Says $7 Mln In Debt Financing To Be Used Towards Expansion Of Phase 2 Of Sundial's Flagship Facility In Olds, Alberta​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Sundial Grower Says $7 Mln In Debt Financing To Be Used Towards Expansion Of Phase 2 Of Sundial's Flagship Facility In Olds, Alberta​
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Cannabis Wheaton Income Corp:
* SUNDIAL AND CANNABIS WHEATON INCOME CORP. SIGN DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT FOR $7 MILLION IN DEBT FINANCING
* SUNDIAL GROWER - $7 MILLION IN DEBT FINANCING TO BE USED TOWARDS EXPANSION OF PHASE 2 OF SUNDIAL’S FLAGSHIP FACILITY IN OLDS, ALBERTA​
* SUNDIAL SAYS $7 MILLION CAN BE REPAID EITHER BY CASH PAYMENT OR DELIVERY OF AGREED VOLUME OF DRIED CANNABIS OR THROUGH COMBINATION OF CASH AND CANNABIS​ Source text for Eikon:
